pullRequest.title: HDDS-4327. Potential resource leakage using BatchOperation.
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
Potential resource leakage using BatchOperation.
Use try enclosed resource/close the batch once after it usage is completed.
What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-4327
How was this patch tested?
Existing tests.

commit.message: HDDS-4327. Potential resource leakage using BatchOperation.

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't lock() be called outside the try block? If there is a chance that the initBatchOperation() can fail, then lock.unlock() would throw IllegalMonitorStateException as the lock is not held by it.
